attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Space raiders for 10p is a national treasure. They have been 10p since i was a taddy swimming in my daddys nutsack and should remain 10p til i am popping up daisys. Sign this petition to change the price back from 15p. Fight the power lerd!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
